text: David Robinson (born April 2, 1949 in Woburn, Massachusetts) is an American rock drummer. He was in many rock bands like The Modern Lovers, DMZ, and The Cars. He went to Woburn Memorial High School. David has left the music industry and was not involved in the formation of The New Cars. title: David Robinson
